description: Experiments in the areas of mechanics, electricity and magnetism, and materials science. Emphasis is on the development of good laboratory techniques, analytical skills, and the ability to work independently. Each 0.25-course registration averages one afternoon of work each week. Offered annually in the spring semester.
name: Adv Physics Lab (375)

revisions.desc: Experiments are selected from the areas of physics covered by PHYS 374, PHYS 375, and PHYS 376 respectively. Emphasis is on the development of good laboratory techniques and the ability to work independently. Each 0.25-course registration averages one afternoon of work each week. Offered annually in the spring semester.

title: Advanced Physics Laboratory
